resources.string: A network connection is required for setup.

Hello and thank you for checking out Latinary. Latinary is a demo application I designed specifically for my developer profile and thus its core functionality is purposely limited. The app showcases thread-safe background data download via web request, data parsing, search functionality, text-to-speech capability, as well as UI customization. Additionally the app is designed to easily be updated to display data from any key/value styled text file with little code change. If you would like to contact me, you can reach out to me on LinkedIn via the button below.
Press the back button one more time to exit.
